game.name: LIFTED
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Captions available, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 혼자서도 개꿀잼 보장! 별난 교수님 때문에 역사 속으로 빨려 들어간 학생 아리! 잃어버린 보물을 찾는 역동적인 시간 여행 퀘스트! 이거 못 참지~ 강추!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Get LIFTED! Play as slacker Ari, the accidental wingman in his professor's manic, love-fueled time heist. Swing, climb, and puzzle through history to outsmart rival tomb raiders in a cinematic '80s blockbuster adventure!
